title: Hankering For A Hot Dog? Try The 66-Pound Hot Dog Sundae
teaser: After making a 100-pound burger, Epic Meal Time, a Canadian YouTube show, moved on to encased meats. It created the hefty sundae to honor the Inland Empire 66ers, a minor league baseball team.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
